info.title: The TwinFlame Horoscope API
info.description: Get accurate daily and weekly horoscopes for all zodiac signs from TwinFlame - used by the popular TwinFlame mobile app. Fast, stable, and backed by real astrologers. Retrieve daily or weekly horoscopes, sign compatibility, mood, lucky number & color, and historical date range. All content written and reviewed by in-house astrology team. Supports multiple languages via ISO-639 codes.

get.description: Retrieves daily or weekly horoscope for specified zodiac sign or all signs. Returns horoscope content with compatibility, mood, lucky number & color. Supports date queries including today, tomorrow, yesterday, specific dates (MM-DD-YYYY), this_week, last_week, next_week. Optional parameters for short versions, language translation, and date range queries.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: The zodiac sign (lowercase), e.g.: aries, gemini, scorpio, or 'all' to return all signs

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date query: 'today', 'tomorrow', 'yesterday', or MM-DD-YYYY format. Also supports 'this_week', 'last_week', 'next_week' for weekly horoscopes

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: If set to true, returns available date range of horoscopes

parameters.name: nodate
parameters.description: If set to true, strips the leading date qualifier from the description

parameters.name: nohistory
parameters.description: If set to true, removes historical references from the horoscope

parameters.name: shorthoro
parameters.description: If set to true, returns a shorter version of the horoscope with no date or history references

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: ISO-639 language code for translation, e.g.: 'es' for Spanish, 'fr' for French, 'de' for German
